sentences.sentence: Venice is in mourning today after 21 people died when a bus plunged off a bridge and caught fire after landing upside down on railway tracks below.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's being reported that formal talks on Ukraine's accession to the EU could begin in December, with a progress report due before that in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Investigators are trying to work out how a brand new electric shuttle bus plunged off a bridge near Venice and caught fire, killing 21 people including the driver and injuring 15 others, five critically.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The bus had collected its passengers from a campsite across the lagoon from the main city. L'autobus che come avete visto è collassato, è uscito fuori di strada da un'altezza di oltre 10 metri, è un autobus elettrico a batterie per cui ha preso fuoco, per cui si sono trovati tutte le persone dentro l'autobus anche con le fiamme, a volte dalle fiamme.

sentences.sentence: Quindi la scena che si è proposta ai pompieri è davvero difficile, davvero brutta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: to the bloc could begin in December, with a progress report expected on the seven conditions Kyiv, which hosted EU foreign ministers this week, must meet due in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Closer ties could prove crucial with winter fast approaching along with a threatened freeze in USA triggered by American political wrangling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: As President Biden made clear, we cannot under any circumstances allow America's support for Ukraine to be interrupted. Time is not our friend. We have enough funding authorities to meet Ukraine's battlefield needs for a bit longer.

sentences.sentence: But we need Congress to act to ensure that there is no disruption in our support.

sentences.sentence: And underlying the need for that support, the ongoing threat of a nuclear disaster at Europe's biggest nuclear power plant.

sentences.sentence: The ministerial visit was a gesture of goodwill, but there was also an offer of arms. que la France a donné son accord à la conclusion de contrats futurs forgés avec l'Arménie qui permettront la livraison de matériel militaire à l'Arménie pour qu'elle puisse assurer sa défense.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Vous comprendrez que je ne puisse pas entrer dans plus de détails pour le moment. French aid will help replace equipment lost by Armenian forces overrun by Azerbaijan's attack on the enclave, an assault that prompted an exodus of 100,000 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Azerbaijan, meanwhile, has vowed to track down Nagorno-Karabakh's political leaders. On the eve of a Roman Catholic Synod billed as a break from tradition, a conclave of conservative

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: cardinals, the Synodal Babel gathers in Rome.

The Vatican Synod is expected to address subjects previously considered taboo, such as the ordination of women and the role of LGBTQ congregants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Portugal is to remove tax breaks for foreign residents just days after thousands of demonstrators took to the streets to protest sky-high rents and house prices. The scheme, launched in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: 2009, was designed to attract investors and professionals to the country. But the influx of wealthy foreigners has stoked a rapid rise in house prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: According to the European Union statistics agency Eurostat, house prices in Portugal shut up by 157% between 2020 and 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Dismissed, dethroned and dishonored, former House Speaker Kevin McCarthy steps out of office flanked by security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the first time a House Speaker has ever been voted out, and it was a vote orchestrated by one of his own Republican Party, backed by seven others. The office of Speaker of the House of the United States House of Representatives is hereby declared vacant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Kevin McCarthy is a feature of the swamp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He has risen to power by collecting special interest money and redistributing that money in exchange for favors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: We are breaking the fever now, and we should elect a speaker who's better.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Until that happens, it seems Congress is suspended.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The chair declares the House in recess, subject to the call of the chair.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Look, you all know Matt Gaetz. You know it was personal. It had nothing to do about spending. It had nothing to do about everything he accused somebody of he was doing. It all was about getting attention from you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And with the American government sailing in unchartered constitutional waters while a replacement for McCarthy's found, deep divisions within American political life and within the Republican Party indicate a particularly stormy presidential election year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The European Parliament is calling for stronger rules to protect press freedom and journalists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The so-called Media Freedom Act proposed last year by the European Commission aims to enforce greater transparency of media funding, the protection of outlets from political pressure and the defence of journalists from spyware like Pegasus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: MEPs say these steps are necessary to protect democracy in the EU, rejecting any attempts by member states to water down the measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: rejecting any attempts by member states to water down the measures. Without media freedom, without media pluralism, without independence of public media and without protecting journalists, there is no democracy worth the name.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: That is precisely why we are making a point here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: And we are also intending to get media freedom and media pluralism on board the rule of law, democracy and fundamental rights framework so that it makes sense that there will be rule of law conditionality also for those countries who do not respect media freedom and media pluralism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The regression of media freedom in countries like Poland and Hungary over recent years has worried journalists and NGOs across the continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Many blame the EU for not taking action soon enough to defend the sector.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: One Hungarian opposition MEP says that this Media Freedom Act comes too late, but that it could potentially correct some of the damages witnessed on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I believe that the European Media Freedom Act is a very long overdue, but very essential piece of legislation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And it is very necessary to have measures such as proposed on the concentration of media ownership or limitations on state funding to media.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: If these processes would have been put in place a decade ago, then it wouldn't have happened that in a European member state such as Hungary, media can run with 90 percent only state funding.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: NGOs and journalistic organizations have previously criticized the measures for not being ambitious enough, warning that some member states would like to water down the paths banning online surveillance and the protection of journalistic sources.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But MEPs insist that these should remain strong.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The parliament will now enter negotiations with member states in order to find a common position on the measures before they can enter into force.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Cherry blossoms in Paris. It's a sight that would have inspired awe and wonder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: They just bloomed six months earlier. But this beautiful sight is now seen as an ominous warning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Further north, temperatures reached 27 degrees Celsius on Monday, which is impacting fruit trees and the farmers who planted them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: These events are a consequence of unusually high temperatures, and France is not alone. Austria, Germany, Poland, and Switzerland also recorded their hottest September on record.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: 2023 is also slotted to become the warmest in human history as climate change accelerates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Newcastle is set to host Paris Saint-Germain

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: in a thrilling Champions League group F clash at St James' Park this evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: PSG started their European campaign with a convincing 2-0 triumph over Borussia Dortmund, although the French champions under new coach Luis Enrique have been somewhat inconsistent in Ligue 1 and are currently sitting in fifth place.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Newcastle's return to European competition has been marked by solid defensive displays that earn them a valuable point against a tough and well-drilled AC Milan side in Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Eddie Howe's men are on a five-game clean sheet streak in all competitions and are currently eighth in the Premier League.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: In Group F's other game, Borussia Dortmund will be looking to bounce back from their loss in the opening game when they welcome AC Milan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: In Group E, Atletico Madrid will lock horns with Feyenoord whilst Celtic will face a tough test against Lazio. In Group G, Manchester City will be bidding to maintain their perfect start in the competition when they face RB Leipzig. In Group H, Barcelona will aim to assert their dominance when they face joint leaders Porto whilst Royal Antwerp will take on Shakhtar Donetsk.
